ref.title: Synthesis and properties of symmetrical N,N'-bis(alkyl)imidazolium bromotrichloroferrate(III) paramagnetic, room temperature ionic liquids with high short-term thermal stability
ref.full: Greeson, K. T.; Hall, N. G.; Redeker, N. D.; Marcischak, J. C.; Gilmore, L. V.; Boatz, J. A.; Le, T. C.; Alston, J. R.; Guenthner, A. J.; Ghiassi, K. B. (2018) J. Mol. Liq. 265, 701-710.
